name: Cube Legal
tag_list: legal, employment, solicitors, law, lawyers, intellectual-property, innovative, financial, ecommerce, divorce-online, legal-documents, will-writing, telephone-legal-advice
overview:
“Legal stuff…without the stuffiness”

Cube Legal offers online legal services and solutions. By harmonising qualified legal personnel with technology they have managed to innovate a breathe of fresh air into a traditionally ‘stuffy’ sector. They provide tech-savvy legal solutions, that are consumer branded, through their online platform.

Clients can access their case round the clock 24/7. All services are based on a fixed fee and are sold as they are described, providing transparency and a consumer focused approach.

You can visit the Cube Legal website to find out more.

Fixed fee services are offered in the following areas:

  • Family Law
  • Business and Entrepreneurial Law
  • Employment Law
  • Litigation
  • Will writing
  • Telephone Legal Advice
  • Letter Writing Service

Voucher codes for discounts on legal products and services are offered through Cube Legal’s website, Facebook and Twitter page. Simply follow Cube Legal to obtain the latest offers.
